___pr-base-commit-id-url.description: In case the buggy build comes from a PR, this field contains the commit URL of the PR base

___pr-remote-repo.description: In the case the buggy build comes from a PR, this field contains the name of the forked repository

___PatchedBuilId.description: If a patched build has been found, ID of the patched build from TravisCI

___NbCPU.description: Number of CPU of the running host

___PatchedBuildURL.description: If the patched build has been found, URL of the TravisCI patched build

___PatchCommit.description: If the patch build has been found, hash of the commit that triggered the build.

___BugCommitUrl.description: URL of the buggy commit. Pay attention that the commit might be not available anymore if it has been deleted.

___PatchCommitUrl.description: If the patched build has been found, URL of the commit corresponding to the patched build. This commit might be not available anymore if it has been deleted.

___NbLibraries.description: Number of required libraries (based on the classpath)

___AngelicValuesByTest.description: An object taking as key a test class name and as value the number of retrieved angelic values

___BuggyBuildDate.description: Date of the end of the buggy build

___BugCommit.description: Commit hash corresponding to the buggy build

___PatchAddedLines.description: Number of added lines (only if human patch has been found)

___FreeMemoryByStep.description: Free memory on the running host JVM (in bytes) for each step

___InitRepoToPush.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___BuildProject.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___ComputeSourceDir.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___TestProject.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___CheckoutPatchedBuild.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___GatherTestInformation.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___PushIncriminatedBuild.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___CloneRepository.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___ComputeClasspath.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___NPERepair.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___CheckoutBuggyBuild.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___AstorRepair.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___CommitPatch.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___ResolveDependency.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___ComputeTestDir.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___NopolRepair.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___ReproductionDate.description: String date of the reproduction of the bug

___FreeMemory.description: Free memory on the running host JVM (in bytes)

___NbFileApp.description: Number of source files (only of the failing module if it concerns a multi module application)

___BuggyBuildId.description: ID of a buggy build from TravisCI

___NbFileTests.description: Number of test files (only of the failing module if it concerns a multi module application)

___StepsDurationsInSeconds.description: The properties give the time spent to execute a specific step of the bug reproduction / repairing in seconds. Those steps could change from one build to another.

___InitRepoToPush.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___BuildProject.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___ComputeSourceDir.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___TestProject.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___CheckoutPatchedBuild.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___GatherTestInformation.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___PushIncriminatedBuild.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___CloneRepository.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___ComputeClasspath.description: Time spent to compute the classpath of the buggy project (in seconds)

___NPERepair.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___CheckoutBuggyBuild.description: Time spent to checkout the commit corresponding to the build (in seconds)

___AstorRepair.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___CommitPatch.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___ResolveDependency.description: Time spent to resolve the dependency of the project (in seconds)

___ComputeTestDir.description: Time spent to compute the path of the test directory (in seconds)

___NopolRepair.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

___PatchDeletedLines.description: Number of deleted lines ((only if human patch has been found)

___PatchedBuildDate.description: If the patched build has been found, date of the end of the patched build

___PatchChangedFiles.description: Number of patched files (only if human patch has been found)

___TotalMemory.description: Total memory on the running host JVM (in bytes)

___pr-head-commit-id.description: In case the buggy build comes from a PR, this field contains the commit hash of the PR head

___pr-head-commit-id-url.description: In case the buggy build comes from a PR, this field contains the commit URL of the PR head

___repo.description: The name of the repository where the bug comes from on the form username/reponame

___hostname.description: Name of the host used to reproduce the bug

___failureName.description: Name of the obtained failure (e.g. AssertionError, NullPointerException...)

___isError.description: Is the failure considered as an error or not

___pr-id.description: ID of the PR on the github

___bugType.description: Not required. Used to distinguish different kind of experiments (failing_passing vs passing_passing)

___is-pr.description: In case the buggy builds comes from a PR this field exists and contains 'true'

___pr-base-commit-id.description: In case the buggy build comes from a PR, this field contains the commit hash of the PR base

___failingModule.description: In case of a multi module project, path to the failing module
